defend_economic_diversity.title: Economic Philosophy
defend_economic_diversity.description: Director Vale's cold smile widens: 'Diversity? Chaos is what you mean. Inefficient redundancy that wastes resources and confuses customers. The archipelago needs strong leadership, not a thousand tiny voices pulling in different directions. Order brings prosperity. The Cartel brings order.'

choices.text: 'Prosperity built on the ruins of others isn't prosperity at all.'
'Let me see your definition of efficiency in your books.'
'The traders will unite against this monopolistic thinking.'
'I need to expose this to the proper authorities.'
